channel.title: Syllabus on 3K: Dynamics and Heterogeneity

item.title: Syllabus for 3K-2019
item.description: Modelling Dynamics and Heterogeneity: Time Series, Cross-Sectional Time Series, and Panel Data Harold D. Clarke, University of Texas Dallas and Robert Walker, Willamette University 5-16 August (two week course / 35 hrs) TOPICS The Core and Related Problems of Heterogeneity and Dynamics A Brief Review of Linear Models Summary and Visualisation of Time Series and Panels Using Stata and R to summarise and visualise single and multiple time series data
